name: Slope Challenge
description:
Tap and hold when you are sliding to gain momentum, and hold in the air to perform crazy flips! The better you land, the faster you will be! Be the first to cross the finish line and the championship prize is yours.

Slope Challenge features:

- simple and satisfying controls!
- Beautiful and elegant graphics!
- No IAP - Slope Challenge is a full game from the moment you download it.
